model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Speaker B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: I didn't watch my grandkids today so I checked out a new book to read.

[MEMORY]
- [Speaker A has 8 grandchildren and enjoys reading books and watching Netflix.] - (SameTopic) - [Speaker A enjoys watching movies with their grandchildren.] 
- [Speaker A has 8 grandchildren and enjoys reading books and watching Netflix.] - (SameTopic) - [Speaker A enjoys watching Jeopardy with their grandchildren and cooking for them, with the busiest time being the weekend.]

speaker: Speaker B
